entries.name: DEFAULT_PERMISSIONS
entries.desc: Default permissions for the trust directory and its contents

entries.name: dir
entries.desc: The directory where trusted certificates will be stored.

entries.name: new(dir, permissions = DEFAULT_PERMISSIONS)
entries.desc: Creates a new TrustDir using dir where the directory and file permissions will be checked according to permissions

entries.name: cert_path(certificate)
entries.desc: Returns the path to the trusted certificate

entries.name: issuer_of(certificate)
entries.desc: Returns the issuer certificate of the given certificate if it exists in the trust directory.

entries.name: name_path(name)
entries.desc: Returns the path to the trusted certificate with the given ASN.1 name

entries.name: trust_cert(certificate)
entries.desc: Add a certificate to trusted certificate list.

entries.name: verify()
entries.desc: Make sure the trust directory exists.  If it does exist, make sure it's actually a directory.  If not, then create it with the appropriate permissions.
